name: Juego de Bloques
description:
Controls

Arrows to move. Space to pick/drop blocks. Gamepad compatible

More Info

Clear blocks by matching 3 or more of the same color in rows or columns. There are 3 different gamemodes:

  • Time Attack: Every few seconds, a nes row of blocks will be added.
  • Speedrun: You manually-add rows by pressing "down". Try to score 100 points as fast as possible.
  • Practice: You manually-add rows by pressing "down". No time, no stress. Just practice in this relaxing mode.

This idea is based on a pico8 cart I saw from @bluswimmer
